modules.description: This module implements DKIM verification and signing operations for email messages. It processes message content from a stream, supporting both verification of existing signatures and signing of unsigned messages. The module works with DKIM keys and signature data structures, handling line-ending conventions during stream processing. Use cases include validating incoming email authenticity and adding DKIM signatures to outgoing messages.

This module provides DKIM verification and signing for email messages, processing content from a stream to support both signature validation and signing of unsigned messages. It handles DKIM keys and signature structures, managing line-ending conventions during stream processing. Operations include verifying signatures on incoming emails and adding DKIM signatures to outgoing messages. Example uses include validating email authenticity and securing outbound mail with DKIM.
